name: Angel Flare (itch)
description:
This is a prototype page for my Game Boy Jam 8 entry. Feel free to provide feedback on how I can make the game more enjoyable ! Game's due to be fully uploaded in 3 days from now ! (on the 6th of september)

Do note that leaderboards will NOT work in WebGL due to a SSL certificate issue with DreamLO. Standalone builds should work and will be provided at jam time !
